org.lindbergframework.core.configuration
Interface CoreConfiguration

All Superinterfaces:
Configuration
All Known Subinterfaces:
WebCoreConfiguration
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCoreConfiguration, ClassPathXmlCoreConfiguration, CoreContext, SimpleCoreConfiguration, WebClassPathXmlCoreConfiguration, XmlCoreConfiguration
public interface CoreConfiguration
extends Configuration

Interface that defines the contract for core configuration implementations.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
